name: Brick Breaker: Shoot Puzzle
description:
Shoot balls & break bricks to blast your way through a classic arcade game! Earn combos, power-ups, & unique items!
Break as many bricks as you can at once to earn scores! Shoot balls and break bricks to solve puzzles in a variety of layouts! Enjoy a unique and fast-paced brick breaker game with 20 challenging levels and lots of fun!
